General.Name: XiAn Tian He Defense Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Xi'an Tianhe Defense Technology Co., Ltd. engages in military equipment, smart security, integrated electronics, communication electronics, and smart coastal defense businesses in China and internationally. It offers short-range low-altitude three-dimensional defense equipment, battlefield environment perception big data systems, defense mobilization equipment, and intelligent border and coastal defense equipment; develops digital military camps and 5G military applications; provides IoT perception products focusing on 5G industry applications in the areas of natural resources, ecological environment protection, and smart transportation; and offers military supporting services. It also provides radio frequency chips, devices, modules, and materials for wireless infrastructure and smart terminal markets; and isolators/circulators, packaging materials, etc. In addition, the company offers data service solutions, which include data acquisition, data mining, data sharing, data application, and other services and products. Its products are used in land, sea, air, rocket forces, strategic support forces, and armed police forces. The company was founded in 2001 and is headquartered in Xi'an, China.

5.Name: Ms. Hua  Chen
